danish_publication: En gang, hr. Jens kjørte fra Kirkholm til Klakring, fik han Fanden op at kjøre, han hængte bag i vognen som en sort puddelhund, og hestene kunde ikke trække den længere. Så skulde kusken tage det venstre baghjul af, og nu måtte Fanden bære vognen.
english_publication: One time, Mr. Jens drove from Kirkholm to Klakring, and he got the devil up for a ride, he hung on back in the wagon like a large poodle, and the horses couldn't pull the wagon any longer. Then the driver had to take the left back wheel off, and now the devil had to carry the wagon.

etk_index.heading_danish: Om Fanden og forbund med ham
etk_index.heading_english: About the Devil and being in league with the Devil
